snippet.title: Zoonomaly - Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
ZOONOMALY is now available on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2101890/Zoonomaly/

I really enjoyed making this game, it was a real challenge for me doing it entirely on my own, but I'm proud of the end result! I hope you like it!

Zoonomaly is a puzzle based horror game set in an open world zoo. You must survive a monster infested zoo while searching for key shards that unlock the truth to its origin. Collect all the key shards by solving puzzles throughout the grounds and put a stop to the monster mayhem.

LIGHTS ARE OFF brings nightmares to life with 3D animation! 
TIKTOK: https://www.tiktok.com/@lights.are.off?lang=en
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/lights.are.off/
